tool_description:
Radiowire provides cloud-based APIs for wealth management. These are end-to-end APIs from 
customer acquisition to portfolio monitoring. We give simple REST APIs to power your user 
journeys while you could focus on building value for your users.
name: Wealth Management
title: Wealth Management

api_list.name: KFin Capital Gains Statement Trigger
api_list.description: API to trigger KFin Capital Gains Statement
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wealth-management.p.rapidapi.com/prod/kfin_pnl"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wealth-management.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Consolidated Account Statement Parser
api_list.description: This API parses two types of CAS - NSDL and CAMS (Refer Portfolio Tracking for more info). Files are uploaded against the same API and the API is intelligent enough to detect the type of file uploaded. Outputs also differ based on the type of file uploaded as the information provided in both the CAS has some differences.

api_list.name: Branch Search
api_list.description:
1. Use the bank name substring to get the bank details including the IFSC and bankId in our system. 
2. Pass branch, ifsc, or address substring along with the bankId received in the previous step to get the branch details.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wealth-management.p.rapidapi.com/prod/banking/ifscSearch"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wealth-management.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: CAMS Consolidated Account Statement Trigger
api_list.description: This API triggers consolidated account statements email from CAMS to the user's email id. The trigger gets detailed transaction statement from 1st Jan 1990 to the date on which the statement is triggered. CAMS provide 2 types of reports - Detailed and Summary. This API only gives a Detailed report.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wealth-management.p.rapidapi.com/prod/cams_cas"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wealth-management.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
